title: Social Insurance 1
overview: Social Insurance 1 provides students with fundamental, systematic, and in-depth knowledge about social insurance, analyzing the nature, role of social insurance; basic viewpoints on social insurance; the relationship and significance of social insurance in social security; the content of the social insurance system based on ILO Convention 102 and accompanying recommendations, conditions and benefits of mandatory and voluntary social insurance in Vietnam; theoretical issues about social insurance finance and social insurance fund.
